games.name: Joe Simulator 2
games.shortdesc: The second Joe simulator game, where Joe runs into some unexpected guests

games.name: Joe Simulator 3
games.shortdesc: The third Joe simulator game, the one where Simplified Joe appears and nobody likes him. Not even Joe.

games.name: Joe Simulator 4
games.shortdesc: The fourth Joe simulator game, it is not released yet!

games.name: Super Joe Fighters Ultimate
games.shortdesc: A giant fighting game with MANY Joe Simulator characters, and charcaters submitted by people on the discord!
games.note: Join the Joecord Discord to submit your own characters!

games.name: Joe Maker
games.shortdesc: Create your own Joe Simulator games in a grid-based way!
games.note: This used to exist but was taken down. Many things were broken.

games.name: Joe Simulator 99
games.shortdesc: Join over-over simplified Joe on his way to... God knows where.
games.note: This was a joke game made of April Fools joking about the oversimplification of Joe & his friends

games.name: Joe Simulator: [REDUX]
games.shortdesc: The original first 2 Joe Simulator games remade in the style of Joe simulator 3, with many more 'improvements'.
games.note: Despite this being a remake, it is recommended to just play the originals instead. There's a reason you can't play it here.
